name: BroadcastChannel.close
description: The BroadcastChannel.close() terminates the connection to the underlying channel, allowing the object to be garbage collected. This is a necessary step to perform as there is no other way for a browser to know that this channel is not needed anymore.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'BroadcastChannel.close()' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.
